name: Антиперспирант Nivea Эффект пудры женский спрей 150мл
ingredients: butane, isobutane, propane, cyclomethicone, aluminum chlorohydrate, isopropyl palmitate, kaolin, persea gratissima oil, octydodecanol, disteardimonium hectorite, dimethicone, limonene, linalool, alpha-isomethyl ionone, geraniol, benzyl alcohol, coumarin, parfum
